name: Samurai`s Way
description:
Embark on an electrifying odyssey through ancient world in "Samurai`s Way", the inaugural title from TinC Studio that merges the relentless thrill of a 2D runner with the strategic depth of a clicker arcade. Drawing inspiration from the storied philosophy of the samurai way, this game invites players to step into the sandals of a novice warrior, forged in the spirit of Bushido, on an epic quest for honor and enlightenment.

As the dawn mist settles over the emerald hills of ancient world, our hero, a young samurai named Kenji, finds himself on a path filled with perils and revelations. Disillusioned by the tyranny corrupting his homeland, Kenji embarks on a relentless journey, seeking wisdom and the strength to bring peace to his people. His travels are not just a test of skill but a spiritual trial to uphold the virtues of Rectitude, Courage, Benevolence, Respect, Honesty, Honor, and Loyalty, which are the pillars of his warrior soul.
